subject: Move notification permission request to after tutorial completion
body:
- Remove notification step from tutorial (now 8 steps instead of 9)
- Simplify TutorialModal by removing notification permission handling
- Enhance useTutorial hook to support onComplete callback
- Request notifications automatically after tutorial completes
- Update documentation to reflect new flow

This creates a smoother onboarding experience where users learn about the
app first, then are prompted for permissions after they complete the tutorial.
title: Move notification permission request to after tutorial completion
